data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Al-Muthannia, Iraq to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al-Muthannia, Iraq
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Al-Muthannia.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Al-Muthannia, Iraq.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Al-Muthannia do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the South Asian, Telugu-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the South Asian, Telugu-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the South Asian, Telugu-speaking people is yours.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Al-Muthannia a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Al-Muthannia. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 1,880 believers living in Al-Muthannia, Iraq.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.
